name: api_animation_Animator
description: Manages, controls, and evaluates the animation of a GameObject.

properties.name: angularVelocity
properties.description: Gets the avatar angular velocity for the last evaluated frame.

properties.name: animatePhysics
properties.description: When enabled, the physics system uses animated transforms from GameObjects with kinematic Rigidbody components to influence other GameObjects.

properties.name: applyRootMotion
properties.description: Should root motion be applied?

properties.name: avatar
properties.description: Gets/Sets the current Avatar.

properties.name: avatarRoot
properties.description: Returns the Avatar root Transform.

properties.name: bodyPosition
properties.description: The position of the body center of mass.

properties.name: bodyRotation
properties.description: The rotation of the body center of mass.

properties.name: cullingMode
properties.description: Controls culling of this Animator component.

properties.name: deltaPosition
properties.description: Gets the avatar delta position for the last evaluated frame.

properties.name: deltaRotation
properties.description: Gets the avatar delta rotation for the last evaluated frame.

properties.name: feetPivotActive
properties.description: Blends pivot point between body center of mass and feet pivot.

properties.name: fireEvents
properties.description: Sets whether the Animator sends events of type AnimationEvent.

properties.name: gravityWeight
properties.description: The current gravity weight based on current animations that are played.

properties.name: hasBoundPlayables
properties.description: Returns true if Animator has any playables assigned to it.

properties.name: hasRootMotion
properties.description: Returns true if the current rig has root motion.

properties.name: hasTransformHierarchy
properties.description: Returns true if the object has a transform hierarchy.

properties.name: humanScale
properties.description: Returns the scale of the current Avatar for a humanoid rig, (1 by default if the rig is generic).

properties.name: isHuman
properties.description: Returns true if the current rig is humanoid, false if it is generic.

properties.name: isInitialized
properties.description: Returns whether the animator is initialized successfully.

properties.name: isMatchingTarget
properties.description: If automatic matching is active.
